alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 7:04PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Gadsden and central Leon Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 704 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Havana, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida State University, Florida A and M, Tallahassee Community College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Macon Community Park, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Griffin Heights, Fred George Park, Lake Ella, Callen Neighborhood, State Capital Complex, Forest Meadows Park, Midtown, Apalachee Ridge Estates, Levy Park, Orchard Pond and Messer Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
